refnamediv.refpurpose: A widget providing a popup menu of integer values (e.g. enums).

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Implemented Interfaces
refsect1.para: GimpIntComboBox implements AtkImplementorIface, GtkCellEditable and GtkCellLayout.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: A widget providing a popup menu of integer values (e.g. enums).

refsect2.title: gimp_int_combo_box_new ()
refsect2.para: Creates a GtkComboBox that has integer values associated with each item. The items to fill the combo box with are specified as a NULL terminated list of label/value pairs.

listitem.simpara: the label of the first item
the value of the first item
a NULL terminated list of more label, value pairs
a new GimpIntComboBox.

refsect2.title: gimp_int_combo_box_new_valist ()
refsect2.para: A variant of gimp_int_combo_box_new() that takes a va_list of label/value pairs. Probably only useful for language bindings.

listitem.simpara: the label of the first item
the value of the first item
a va_list with more values
a new GimpIntComboBox.

refsect2.title: gimp_int_combo_box_new_array ()
refsect2.para: A variant of gimp_int_combo_box_new() that takes an array of labels. The array indices are used as values.

listitem.simpara: the number of values
an array of labels (array length must be n_values)
a new GimpIntComboBox.

refsect2.title: gimp_int_combo_box_prepend ()
refsect2.para: This function provides a convenient way to prepend items to a GimpIntComboBox. It prepends a row to the combo_box's list store and calls gtk_list_store_set() for you.
The column number must be taken from the enum GimpIntStoreColumns.

listitem.simpara: a GimpIntComboBox
pairs of column number and value, terminated with -1

refsect2.title: gimp_int_combo_box_append ()
refsect2.para: This function provides a convenient way to append items to a GimpIntComboBox. It appends a row to the combo_box's list store and calls gtk_list_store_set() for you.
The column number must be taken from the enum GimpIntStoreColumns.

listitem.simpara: a GimpIntComboBox
pairs of column number and value, terminated with -1

refsect2.title: gimp_int_combo_box_set_active ()
refsect2.para: Looks up the item that belongs to the given value and makes it the selected item in the combo_box.

listitem.simpara: a GimpIntComboBox
an integer value
TRUE on success or FALSE if there was no item for this value.

refsect2.title: gimp_int_combo_box_get_active ()
refsect2.para: Retrieves the value of the selected (active) item in the combo_box.

listitem.simpara: a GimpIntComboBox
return location for the integer value
TRUE if value has been set or FALSE if no item was active.

refsect2.title: gimp_int_combo_box_connect ()
refsect2.programlisting: gulong gimp_int_combo_box_connect (GimpIntComboBox *combo_box, gint value, GCallback callback, gpointer data);
refsect2.para: A convenience function that sets the inital value of a GimpIntComboBox and connects callback to the "changed" signal.

This function also calls the callback once after setting the initial value. This is often convenient when working with combo boxes that select a default active item (like for example gimp_drawable_combo_box_new). If you pass an invalid initial value, the callback will be called with the default item active.

listitem.simpara: a GimpIntComboBox
the value to set
a callback to connect to the combo_box's "changed" signal
a pointer passed as data to g_signal_connect()
the signal handler ID as returned by g_signal_connect()
